name: The Haven
description:
The world has been ravaged by the W.O.L.F virus, which takes over the victim, altering their mind but only minorly altering their physical appearance. These infected people strive to infect more people and kill those they don’t. Little Red and their partner ‘Green' are travelling through the aftermath of this pandemic, to a community-built haven colloquially known as ‘Grandmothers cottage’.

First Chapter/test
